name: CATastrophe!
description:
Knock things over in order to reach the treats without getting caught by their cat-parent and take them back to their hideout. 

Stay Silent as making too much noise will alert the guard dog who is watching your every move, waiting to bark at any sort of loud noise the cat makes; therefore alerting your owner. You must make use of the cat’s abilities (including walking, knocking obstacles over with their paw, hiding and collecting items) in order to make a seamless escape from the level back to their hideout. This game contains many stealth elements inspired by a myriad of different games, however,  inspired by a real-life cat and its cheeky behaviour.

Team:

Siyathandana Nontolwana (Level Designer)

Linda Sumbu (Art Director)
